select L_NO from location where l_address_detail=#{lAddressDetail} and l_address=#{lAddress} and h_no=#{hNo}

select * from hostclass order by c_end_time desc

select * from selectClass order by c_start_time desc
select * from selectClass where loc=#{loc} order by c_start_time desc
select * from selectClass where category_name=#{'categoryName'} order by c_start_time desc
select * from selectClass where h_no=#{hNo} order by c_start_time desc
select count(*) from selectClass where h_no=#{hNo}
mapper.update: update hostclass set C_NAME= #{cName},CATEGORY_CODE=#{CateCode}, C_PRICE= #{cPrice}, PPNUM=#{ppnum}, C_START_TIME=#{cStart},C_TIME=#{cTime} where c_no=#{cNo}

update C_Contents set THUMBNAIL= #{thumbnail},CONTENTS_FILENAME1=#{cFilename1}, CONTENTS_FILENAME2= #{cFilename2}, CONTENTS_FILENAME3=#{cFilename3}, CONTENTS_FILENAME4=#{cFilename4},CONTENTS_FILENAME5=#{cFilename5}, CONTENTS_CONTENT=#{content} where c_no=#{cNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from hostclass where h_no = #{hNo}
select count(*) from concern where c_no=#{cNo} and m_no=#{mNo}

SELECT H.C_NO , H.C_NAME , H.CATEGORY_CODE , H.H_NO , H.L_NO , H.C_PRICE , H.PPNUM , H.C_REGDATE , H.C_START_TIME , H.END_FLAG , H.C_TIME , H.FPNUM
, C.CATEGORY_CODE AS "category.categoryCode" , C.CATEGORY_NAME AS "category.categoryName"
, L.L_NO AS "location.lNo" , L.L_LATITUDE AS "location.lLatitude" , L.L_LONGITUDE AS "location.lLongitude" , L.ZIPCODE AS "location.zipcode" , L.L_ADDRESS AS "location.lAddress" , L.L_ADDRESS_DETAIL AS "location.lAddressDetail" , L.H_NO AS "location.hNo"
, CC.CONTENTS_NO AS "contents.contentsNo" , CC.C_NO AS "contents.cNo" , CC.THUMBNAIL AS "contents.thumbnail" , CC.CONTENTS_FILENAME1 AS "contents.contentsFilename1" , CC.CONTENTS_FILENAME2 AS "contents.contentsFilename2" , CC.CONTENTS_FILENAME3 AS "contents.contentsFilename3" , CC.CONTENTS_FILENAME4 AS "contents.contentsFilename4" , CC.CONTENTS_FILENAME5 AS "contents.contentsFilename5" , CC.CONTENTS_CONTENT AS "contents.contentsContent"
, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(R_RATE), 1) FROM REVIEW WHERE C_NO = H.C_NO) AS TOTAL_R_RATE
FROM HOSTCLASS H LEFT OUTER JOIN C_CONTENTS CC ON CC.C_NO = H.C_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_CODE = H.CATEGORY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION L ON L.L_NO = H.L_NO WHERE 1=1
AND H.C_NAME LIKE '%' || #{cName} || '%'
AND H.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}
AND L.L_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{lAddress} || '%'
mapper.update: update hostclass set end_flag = 'Y' where c_no = #{cNo}
